alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Hanover; Henrico (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 9:23PM EDT until June 26 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD...CENTRAL HENRICO AND SOUTH CENTRAL HANOVER COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 922 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richmond, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Highland Springs around 930 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Chamberlayne, Richmond Heights, Roslyn Hills, Varina, Midlothian, Drewrys Bluff, Montrose, Richmond International, Greendale and Dumbarton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Hanover; Henrico
